snippet: How much is Facebook worth? The company, which was projected to surpass $3 billion in revenue in 2011, is expected garner a market value of $100 billion with its initial public offering later this year. Read more »
abstract: How much is Facebook worth? The company, which was projected to surpass $3 billion in revenue in 2011, is expected garner a market value of $100 billion with its initial public offering later this year. Read more »
lead_paragraph: How much is Facebook worth? The company, which was projected to surpass $3 billion in revenue in 2011, is expected to garner a market value of $100 billion with its initial public offering later this year. A look at its value over time and its biggest investors. Read more »
